name: Danger! in Dungeonville
description:
Hey! So this is my first fully functioning game that I've ever made! It's not exactly like I wanted it to turn out and I might make a couple changes after submitting it for a game jam.  It's what I could make in a week though, and I'm very proud of it.

Anyways, enjoy this little game, gather your loot and avoid the humans!

Font used: Enchanted Land by Dennis Ludlow

All other assets made by me
